product.name: Almay Truly Lasting Color Makeup
product.description: Longwear meets skincare.tlc truly lasting color makeup delivers up to 16 hours of flawless coverage that won't rub off - even in heat and humidity. Plus, it nourishes skin with antioxidant green tea to protect, vitamin E to help smooth and lemon extract to brighten... for all day, natural radiance. Now, that's tlc.hypoallergenic • oil-free • won't clog pores • dermatologist tested
